senses.sense_definition: Брать имущество во временное пользование за плату на определённый срок.

examples.text: Мы решили <w>арендовать</w> машину, чтобы свободно путешествовать по стране.

target_lang_translations.en: We decided to <w>rent</w> a car to travel freely around the country.

examples.text: Для открытия магазина компании нужно <w>арендовать</w> помещение в центре.

target_lang_translations.en: To open a store, the company needs to <w>rent</w> a space in the center.

target_lang_definitions.en: To take possession of property for temporary use in exchange for payment for a specific period.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: The most common and general term for paying to use property, cars, or equipment.
Often implies a formal legal agreement for a longer duration, common for commercial real estate or vehicles.
Specifically used for hiring an entire vehicle (such as a ship, aircraft, or bus) for a specific journey.
